text:
Odo Marquard (26 February 1928 - 9 May 2015) was a German philosopher.
Marquard was born in Stolp, Farther Pomerania. In 1984 he was awarded the Sigmund Freud Prize by the Deutsche Akademie für Sprache und Dichtung. Marquard died at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: Deutsche Akademie für Sprache und Dichtung
